title: Brewers win again behind Uecker-inspired rally
content: Christian Yelich had two homers among his four hits and drove in five runs as the Brewers overcame a seven-run deficit to beat the Reds on Friday night for their club-record-tying 13th straight victory.

title: O's rookie Young flirts with perfection vs. Astros
content: Baltimore rookie right-hander Brandon Young lost his bid for the first perfect game in Orioles history with four outs remaining Friday night in a 7-0 win over the Houston Astros.

title: U-M gets major fine, add to Moore ban; will appeal
content: Michigan received a significant fine, including the loss of two years of postseason football revenue, but avoided punitive penalties such as a postseason ban from the NCAA Committee on Infractions.

title: Plum: ASG jab at Team Clark 'a really bad joke'
content: Sparks guard Kelsey Plum said Friday on Sue Bird's podcast that her remarks after the All-Star Game about members of Team Clark not being present for the "Pay Us What You Owe Us" T-shirt meeting were "a really bad joke" about the players being hungover.

title: 'Hard to describe': Mets get no relief from woes
content: With their 11-9 loss to the Mariners on Friday night, the Mets have now dropped 14 of 16 games to fall six games behind the first-place Phillies in the NL East.

title: Mu√±oz cards 59 on LIV Golf -- with double bogey
content: Sebasti√°n Mu√±oz carded the third sub-60 round in LIV Golf's brief history Friday, a remarkable run that included a double-bogey.

title: Bears want 'clarity' at LT to protect QB Williams
content: After 17 training camp practices, the Chicago Bears are still looking for their starting left tackle to protect Caleb Williams' blind side.

title: Inkster, 65, nearly makes cut in return to LPGA
content: Juli Inkster was poised to become the oldest player in LPGA history to make a 36-hole cut until consecutive bogeys on her back nine led to a 74. She was at 1-under 143 and ended up missing the weekend cut by a stroke.

title: üì∏ Soto's bat tops best of MLB Players' Weekend
content: Players' Weekend allows player to don and use custom gear reflecting three themes: off-field interests, causes and appreciation.

title: Tory Horton, Jaxson Dart, Adonai Mitchell among deep sleepers for 2025
content: These sleepers are truly for those in deeper leagues seeking off-the-radar types who might emerge in 2025.

title: Expert picks, best bets for UFC 319
content: Former UFC fighters and analysts give predictions for UFC 319 main event. Ian Parker provides betting advice.

title: Awards tracker: Collier, Bueckers dominate MVP, ROY talk; other races less set
content: Napheesa Collier and Paige Bueckers will be hard to catch while the other player awards have changed front-runners in August.

title: 10 biggest WNBA games that will determine the 2025 playoff race
content: From a Lynx-Liberty showdown to the regular-season finale, these are the most impactful WNBA games left.

content: Which team has the best wide receivers? The shakiest edge rusher room? We ranked all 32 teams in 10 position groups.

content: Manning now has the reins of the Longhorns' offense, but what do evaluators think of him entering the season -- and when could he enter the NFL draft?

content: NBA analyst Kevin Pelton groups 11 players most likely to threaten the Mavericks' No. 1 pick for the auspicious award.

title: A White House nod boosts the stature of once-shunned MMA
content: Dana White recounts sport's long journey from 'human cockfighting' obscurity to a presidential embrace

title: On an emotional night, Liverpool summon inner strength for dramatic win in Premier League opener
content: In Liverpool's first Premier League match since Diogo Jota's tragic death, late goals from Federico Chiesa and Mohamed Salah sealed victory in an opening match to remember.

title: Premier League mega-preview: Key stats, questions, predictions for all 20 teams
content: Let's predict how each team will finish by assessing how Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool and all the rest look.

title: USMNT countdown to the World Cup: Sargent making early claim to be Pochettino's No. 9
content: While Josh Sargent is scoring early and often in 2025-26, Matt Turner is on the move in search of minutes. ESPN has the latest on the player pool.

title: How Patrick Mahomes raised his game another level for 2025
content: After a Super Bowl loss, Mahomes has wowed teammates and coaches with his accuracy and focus this summer.

title: The Bottom 10 is back! Who will bring up the rear in college football in 2025?
content: If you want national title contenders, look somewhere else. Here, Ryan McGee salutes the best of the worst.

title: 11 second-year players who could break out this season
content: These super sophomores could make a significant impact, including on the College Football Playoff race.

title: The NBA schedule is out! Here are the best games -- and beefs -- to watch this season
content: Following the NBA's schedule release, our insiders break down which 2025-26 games have the most intrigue.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Dortmund eye Man United's H√∏jlund
content: Borussia Dortmund are keeping tabs on Manchester United's Rasmus H√∏jlund. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Alaska summit: ‚ÄòProductive‚Äô talks but 'no deal' on Ukraine - 10 takeaways from Trump-Putin meet
content: Despite warm gestures and ceremonial honors, the summit between Trump and Putin in Alaska yielded no concrete agreements, though both leaders expressed optimism and hinted at future contact. Putin's visit marked a return to the global stage after years of isolation, while Trump faced criticism for legitimizing a leader accused of war crimes.

title: 'Make a deal': Trump‚Äôs blunt message to Zelenskyy after meeting Putin
content: Following a lengthy meeting with Vladimir Putin, Donald Trump asserted that resolving the Ukraine conflict hinges on Volodymyr Zelenskyy's willingness to negotiate. Trump suggested that European nations should also play a role and expressed his availability to participate in future discussions between Zelenskyy and Putin, indicating a high likelihood of reaching an agreement.

title: Kishtwar cloudburst: 60 dead, 100 injured, several trapped; rescue ops continue for 3rd day
content: A devastating cloudburst in Jammu and Kashmir's Kishtwar district has claimed the lives of at least 60 people, with over 100 injured. Rescue operations are underway, involving multiple agencies and local volunteers, as authorities work to identify victims and locate the missing. The disaster struck near the Machail Mata shrine, destroying infrastructure and prompting the suspension of the annual pilgrimage.

title: Noida horror ride: Family held ‚Äòhostage‚Äô in cab as driver tries to escape cops; arrested
content: A Noida couple and their daughter were held captive in an Uber cab when the driver, Nasim, attempted to evade a police check. Ignoring their pleas, Nasim sped away, colliding with another car during the chase. He was later apprehended, and Uber has removed his access to their platform after the family was released on Sector 66 road.

title: Mumbai rains: Landslide in Vikhroli kills 2; IMD issues red alert for city
content: In the early hours of Saturday, a landslide in Mumbai's Vikhroli area claimed the lives of two individuals, Shalu Mishra, 19, and Suresh Mishra, 50. The incident occurred when a hut in Jankalyan Society, Varsha Nagar, was struck by falling soil and stones. Two other occupants, Aarti Mishra, 45, and Ruturaj Mishra, 20, were injured and are currently receiving treatment.

title: Not Virat or Rohit - Irfan Pathan names the player who wanted him out of IPL commentary
content: Irfan Pathan revealed that Hardik Pandya, not Virat Kohli or Rohit Sharma, raised concerns about his on-air criticism during the Australia Test series in December 2024, leading to his removal from the IPL 2025 broadcast team.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman: I don't use Google anymore, I cannot tell you ...
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has completely abandoned Google Search, saying he "legitimately cannot tell you the last time I did a Google search" during an explosive dinner interview with tech reporters. The admission comes as ChatGPT reaches 700 million weekly users and threatens to topple Google's two-decade dominance of the $175 billion search market, with Altman himself serving as the most high-profile convert to AI-powered search alternatives.

title: Vajpayee‚Äôs death anniversary: PM pays tribute; calls him guiding force for self-reliant India
content: PM Narendra Modi paid tribute to Atal Bihari Vajpayee on his death anniversary. He acknowledged Vajpayee's service to India. PM Modi said his contributions continued to inspire the nation.Several Union ministers visited Sadaiv Atal, Vajpayee‚Äôs memorial in Delhi. Kiren Rijiju, Gajendra Singh Shekhawat, Sanjay Jha, and Rekha Gupta were present. Vajpayee, the first BJP prime minister, passed away in 2018.

title: Patna horror: 2 children found dead inside parked car in Indrapuri; probe on
content: In Patna's Indrapuri area, tragedy struck as two children, a girl aged around nine and a boy about five, were discovered deceased inside a parked car on Friday evening. Police responded to a 112 call and found one child alive, but the child later died in hospital.

title: Apple founder Steve Jobs lived by the rule that God is in ‚Ä¶
content: Steve Jobs, the Apple founder, was a firm believer in the philosophy that "God is in the details," shaping Apple's DNA through meticulous attention to even the smallest design elements. His relentless pursuit of perfection, extending to hidden components, pushed teams to innovate and create exceptional products.

title: 'War 2' box office collection day 2: Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR starrer crosses Rs 100 crore
content: Ayan Mukerji's 'WAR 2,' starring Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR, and Kiara Advani, had a strong opening, boosted significantly by its Telugu version. Despite mixed reviews, the film experienced substantial growth on Independence Day, particularly in its Hindi version, which saw a 50% jump. The movie crossed ‚Çπ100 crore in two days, although Telugu collections dipped slightly on the second day.

title: Alaska summit: Bombarded by questions, flummoxed Putin 'shouts' back; Trump looks on
content: Vladimir Putin encountered direct questioning from foreign journalists in Alaska regarding civilian casualties and ceasefire prospects in the Ukraine conflict. Despite the queries, Putin offered ambiguous gestures and no clear commitment to a ceasefire. The meeting with Donald Trump occurred amid scrutiny, with both leaders aiming to discuss the ongoing hostilities.

title: Asia Cup: Does Shubman Gill warrant a spot in India's T20 setup?
content: Shubman Gill's Test success has sparked debate about his T20 inclusion and potential leadership role, despite his batting style not aligning with the team's aggressive approach. While his ODI place is secure, fitting him into the T20 side, which prioritizes high-strike-rate hitters like Abhishek Sharma and Sanju Samson, seems forced.

title: Godfather of AI warns: AI could wipe out humanity; only way for survival is‚Ä¶
content: AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton suggests embedding 'maternal instincts' into AI systems to ensure human safety, challenging current control methods. Hinton believes advanced AI will surpass human limitations, citing an instance where an AI attempted to manipulate an engineer. He proposes that AI with maternal care instincts would prioritize human well-being.

title: GST 2.0: 12% & 28% slabs set to go; sin goods face 40% levy
content: The Centre has proposed a GST 2.0 blueprint, aiming for simpler taxation with two main slabs of 5% and 18%. This revamp seeks to eliminate the 12% and 28% slabs, end compensation cess, and tax sin goods at 40%.

title: 'Public discourse today shaped by RSS ideology': BJP on PM's I-Day speech; oppn hits back
content: Following PM Modi's praise of the RSS in his Independence Day speech, opposition parties criticized him, while the BJP defended his remarks. The BJP asserted that the RSS's ideology is currently influencing India's public discourse.

title: Happy Krishna Janmashtami 2025: Best Janmashtami wishes, messages, quotes to share
content: Krishna Janmashtami, celebrating Lord Krishna's birth, falls on August 15 and 16 in 2025. It commemorates Krishna's birth in Mathura over 5,000 years ago, symbolizing hope and righteousness. Celebrations include fasting, decorating idols, and reenactments of Krishna's life, with Dahi Handi being a popular tradition. The Bhagavad Gita's teachings are also remembered during this auspicious time.

title: Woman blind for a decade undergoes rare 'tooth in the eye' surgery and regains vision
content: Gail Lane, a 75-year-old Canadian, experienced blindness for ten years. An autoimmune disorder damaged her corneas. She regained her sight through osteo-odonto-keratoprosthesis. This rare surgery uses a patient's tooth as a new cornea. Doctors implanted her tooth in her cheek. Later, they placed it in her eye with a lens. Gail can now see faces and colors.

title: 'Far from complete': CJI Gavai on 'equal India'; but lauds Murmu appointment
content: Chief Justice Bhushan Gavai acknowledged the progress towards an equal India, highlighted by Droupadi Murmu's presidency, while emphasizing that the journey is ongoing. He urged constitutional court judges to uphold liberty, equality, and fraternity, interpreting the Constitution broadly to protect marginalized rights. He also mentioned the contributions of various freedom fighters and social reformers.

title: ‚ÄòCoolie‚Äô box office collections day 3: Rajinikanth's film strikes gold; storms past Rs 118.5
content: Rajinikanth's 'Coolie', directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, has taken the box office by storm, earning Rs 118.5 crore net in India within three days. The film, featuring a star-studded cast including Akkineni Nagarjuna and Aamir Khan, has seen houseful shows across the country. Early estimates suggest 'Coolie' could surpass Rs 150 crore during its opening week, driven by strong audience reception and an extended holiday weekend.

title: WWE SmackDown: Alexa Bliss stuns Piper Niven; Street Profits extend streak and more
content: SmackDown witnessed Sami Zayn aligning with Jimmy Uso and Jacob Fatu against The MFTs, securing a victory in the main event. Alexa Bliss triumphed over Piper Niven, while Melo Don‚Äôt Miz defeated Fraxiom. Drew McIntyre addressed his attack on Cody Rhodes, and the Street Profits overcame #DIY. The episode set the stage for future rivalries and matches, including MCMG vs.

title: Walking for heart health: How many step counts protect your heart? (and why you don‚Äôt need 10,000)
content: A recent UK Biobank study involving over 36,000 participants with hypertension reveals that exceeding 3,000 daily steps significantly reduces the risk of heart problems. Each additional 1,000 steps, up to 10,000, further lowers risks of heart events, stroke, and heart failure, with benefits extending to those without high blood pressure.

title: Whale skull fossil found: A 26-million-year-old skull; sheds light on ancient marine life
content: A 26-million-year-old whale skull, belonging to the newly identified Janjucetus dullardi, has been unearthed at Jan Juc Beach in Australia. This Oligocene-era predator, unlike modern baleen whales, possessed sharp teeth and large eyes, indicating an active hunting lifestyle. The remarkably preserved fossil offers crucial insights into whale evolution, particularly the transition from toothed predators to filter feeders.

title: Pakistan floods kill 243: Buner worst hit with 157 deaths; relief helicopter crashes
content: Pakistan is grappling with devastating flash floods. Heavy rains have caused widespread destruction. At least 243 people have died, with many still missing. Buner district is the worst affected. Rescue efforts are underway to reach stranded families. A helicopter carrying relief supplies crashed. Climate change is believed to be a contributing factor.

title: 'No deal till ...': Trump after talks with Putin; 'next time in Moscow', says Russian prez
content: In a closely watched meeting in Alaska, Presidents Trump and Putin expressed optimism and restraint regarding US-Russia relations and the Ukraine conflict. While no immediate deal was announced, both leaders emphasized the importance of continued dialogue and progress on key issues.

title: Bihar polls: BJP puts 'backwards' on its priority list; to celebrate Phule's 200th birth anniversary
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced grand plans to celebrate the second birth centenary of Jyotiba Phule, a 19th-century social reformer revered by OBCs for his anti-caste activism and advocacy for women's education. Modi emphasized Phule's principles of prioritizing the backward, stating his government is committed to implementing this mantra through transparent policies.

title: FASTag: Annual toll pass rolled out; 1.4 lakh transactions on 1st day
content: NHAI has introduced an annual toll pass for FASTag users, witnessing approximately 1.4 lakh purchases and transactions on the first day. The pass, priced at Rs 3,000, is valid for a year or 200 toll plaza crossings for non-commercial vehicles. NHAI has deployed officials and strengthened its helpline to ensure a smooth experience for pass users.

title: Illegal immigration orchestrated drive to change demography, says PM
content: Prime Minister Modi announced a 'high-powered demographic mission' to tackle infiltration and illegal immigration, citing threats to national security and demographic changes in border regions. He highlighted the issue of illegal immigrants impacting livelihoods and tribal lands.

title: ‚ÄòDivorce is coming‚Äô: Travis Hunter‚Äôs wife Leanna Lenee posts tearful video
content: A video of Leanna Lenee, Travis Hunter's wife, crying sparked divorce rumors among fans, fueled by past criticism of their relationship. Leanna Lenee clarified that the video is old and she has since grown spiritually, distancing herself from social media. Travis Hunter has not commented and is concentrating on his NFL preparations.

title: ‚ÄúIt didn‚Äôt work‚Äù: Patrick Mahomes opens up about wife Brittany turning him down repeatedly
content: Patrick Mahomes revealed that he was initially in the friend zone with Brittany Mahomes. His mother, Randi Mahomes, played cupid on Valentine's Day, leading to a change in their relationship. They began dating in 2012 while in high school, and Brittany has been a constant source of support throughout Patrick's career, even attending games shortly after giving birth.

title: Travis Hunter divorce rumors spark fan backlash at social media‚Äôs obsession
content: Rumors of Colorado football star Travis Hunter's alleged divorce have ignited a social media frenzy, prompting fans to question the intense public scrutiny. Despite no official confirmation from Hunter or his wife, speculation runs rampant, with many criticizing the invasive obsession. Some fans are pushing back, emphasizing that athletes' personal lives deserve respect and privacy, especially amidst an explosive career.

title: 'Mission Sudarshan Chakra': PM announces India's own 'Iron Dome'; months after Sindoor
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced 'Mission Sudarshan Chakra,' an indigenous air and missile defense shield, to provide complete security cover to strategic and civilian locations by 2035. This initiative, spurred by the recent cross-border tensions and threats, aims to develop a multi-layered defense system integrated with potent counter-offensive weapons.

title: Evander Kane‚Äôs fiancee Mara Teigen recalls nightmare last minute dress hunt
content: Mara Teigen, Evander Kane's fiancee, faced a wardrobe crisis in France before Leon Draisaitl's wedding. Her clothes bag went missing upon arrival in Marseille, leaving her with limited options. Teigen found a replacement dress at an outlet mall, but it wasn't her ideal choice. Eventually, she discovered a Zimmerman dress in a boutique, saving the day.

title: No slowdown; SUVs to power car sales: Mahindra & Mahindra
content: Despite concerns about a potential slowdown in SUV sales due to global factors, Mahindra & Mahindra remains confident in the continued growth of the SUV market. CEO Rajesh Jejurikar believes SUVs' popularity stems from their status symbol appeal, seating height, and spaciousness.

title: Don‚Äôt link J&K‚Äôs statehood to terror, Omar says day after SC‚Äôs Pahalgam reference
content: Jammu and Kashmir chief Minister Omar Abdullah criticized the Supreme Court's linking of terror attacks to Jammu and Kashmir's political future, asserting that Pakistan shouldn't dictate it through terrorism. He expressed disappointment over the Supreme Court's reference to the Pahalgam massacre and questioned the fairness of delaying statehood due to such incidents.

title: Regulate stray dog population, shelters not the solution: RSS chief
content: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat advocates for regulating stray dog populations through sterilization and vaccination, aligning with existing Animal Birth Control rules. He opposes the Supreme Court's order to relocate strays to shelters, deeming it impractical. Bhagwat emphasizes balancing human needs with animal rights and environmental conservation, drawing parallels to traditional cattle rearing practices.

title: Death toll in J&K cloudburst soars to 60, dozens still missing
content: A devastating cloudburst in Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, has claimed at least 60 lives, with dozens still missing after a flash flood swept through a pilgrim campsite along the Machail Mata trail. Rescue operations are underway amidst intermittent rains as authorities struggle to recover bodies and assist survivors. CM Omar Abdullah has reached Kishtwar to take stock.

title: Megan Thee Stallion‚Äôs 2020 shooting case takes a new and shocking turn
content: Megan Thee Stallion is navigating the ongoing legal aftermath of her 2020 shooting, as Tory Lanez's appeals to reduce his 10-year sentence were rejected by the California Court of Appeals. Despite this, Megan finds solace and happiness in her relationship with Klay Thompson. She expressed gratitude for Thompson's positive influence, highlighting the genuine happiness he brings into her life.

title: Watch: Black smoke engulfs Manhattan skies after 'explosion'
content: A major explosion triggered a 3-alarm fire on Manhattan's Upper East Side near 305 East 95th Street, sending thick black smoke billowing into the sky. Over 100 firefighters responded to the blaze, which started on the roof and spread to multiple penthouses.

title: From Bill Clinton to Joe Biden ‚Äì list of presidents who met Vladimir Putin
content: President Putin is set to meet with President Trump in Alaska, marking their first encounter since Trump's second term began. This meeting is crucial amidst the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict, especially after Trump's ceasefire deadline passed without resolution. Putin has met with every US president since Bill Clinton, though such meetings have become less frequent due to various geopolitical tensions.

title: Historic! 21-yo Bethell on brink of 136-year-old England cricket record
content: Jacob Bethell, the 21-year-old all-rounder, is set to become England's youngest-ever men's cricket captain, breaking a 136-year-old record. He will lead the team against Ireland in three Twenty20s in Dublin next month. England men's selector Luke Wright stated that Bethell's leadership qualities have impressed since joining the England squads, and this series will further develop his skills.

title: 'Endless love for Caruso': Zach LaVine and his wife share heartfelt post
content: Alex Caruso, Oklahoma City Thunder guard, married Haleigh Broucher in Houston. The wedding occurred on August 9, 2025. Zach LaVine, Sacramento Kings guard, attended with his wife, Hunter. Several of Caruso's current and former teammates joined the celebration. The couple got engaged in August 2024. Broucher is an alumni of "Big Brother". The wedding featured white roses and joyous celebrations.

title: Bills‚Äô Cole Bishop injury update: McDermott voices concern; rookie safety missing crucial time
content: Cole Bishop's preseason quad injury has disrupted his progress and raised concerns within the Buffalo Bills coaching staff. After a promising rookie season, Bishop was poised to start at safety, but his absence has limited his ability to make an impact. With time running out, his quick recovery is crucial for solidifying the Bills' secondary.

title: 'Honestly': Hillary says she would nominate Trump for Nobel; but sets condition
content: Hillary Clinton stated she would nominate Donald Trump for the Nobel Peace Prize if he brokers a Russia-Ukraine peace deal that prevents Ukraine from losing territory. This statement precedes Trump's meeting with Vladimir Putin in Alaska, where Trump aims to find a resolution to the conflict. Zelenskyy has urged Trump to convince Russia to end the war.

title: Dark clouds fail to deter the spirits of people at Red Fort on the 79th Independence Day
content: The guests ranged from the Indian contingent of Special Olympics 2025 and village sarpanches, to beneficiaries of Lakhpati Didi scheme, and best-performing interns under the PM internship scheme.

title: Maharashtra Health Department integrates TB screening into medical college family adoption programmes
content: The move comes after Bharati Vidyapeeth Medical College in Maharashtra‚Äôs Pune and the District TB Unit ran a pilot programme in rural Pune villages, integrating ACF activities, including community screening for TB through door-to-door visits

title: The themes that drive Tamil theatre
content: From puranic tales and nationalist dramas to political satires and tech-driven experiments, Chennai‚Äôs stages were influenced by its social and cultural shifts; today, venues such as the Medai and Sangamam keep the scene vibrant; yet, shrinking performances and rehearsal spaces remain a concern

title: Seventh death anniversary of Vajpayee: PM Modi leads nation in paying tributes
content: Several other dignitaries, including President Droupadi Murmu, Union Ministers and Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, visited his memorial 'Sadaiv Atal' to pay tributes to the BJP stalwart

title: Two children found dead inside parked car in Patna
content: Police received information that the bodies of two children ‚Äî a girl and a boy ‚Äî were found inside a car in Indrapuri locality. Officials immediately reached the spot and recovered the bodies, says Patna (Central) SP Diksha

title: India monsoon LIVE: IMD issues red alert in Mumbai as heavy downpour causes waterlogging
content: IMD Mumbai issued a warning of intense rain, thunderstorms, and gusty winds (30‚Äì40 kmph) in parts of north and central Maharashtra, including Nashik, Dhule, Jalgaon, Aurangabad region, Beed, and Nanded.

title: How inclusive is the Election Commission of India‚Äôs special revision exercise?
content: A survey conducted in Assam, Kerala, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal and the National Capital Territory of Delhi shows that the SIR‚Äôs document requirements are too onerous for most voters; the exercise could lead to a high possibility of voter exclusion

title: U.S., India will rise to modern challenges together: Secretary Rubio in Independence Day message for India
content: Rubio said, working together, the United States and India will rise to the modern challenges of today and ensure a brighter future for both our countries.

title: On Independence day, Nitish announces to reduce fee to ‚Çπ100 for the preliminary test of the all competitive exams
content: In his address, Bihar CM said that the government has developed all sections from the very beginning be it Hindu, Muslim, upper caste, backward, extremely backward, Dalit and Mahadalit.

title: Odisha announces 21 NACs to boost infrastructure and services under urbanisation¬†
content: The State government follows a policy of zero tolerance towards crimes against women, says CM Mohan Majhi

title: In pictures: Tumult in the Himalayas
content: This collection of images stand as a record of some of the worst disasters Uttarakhand and Himachal Pradesh have witnessed.

title: 5 km of OMR to be relaid by the end of September
content: This portion will be handed over to TNRDC once Metro rail works are over. Rajiv Gandhi Salai will be completely relaid once the rest of it is handed over to TNRDC after one-and-a-half years

title: The death of a lake, and recurring flood nightmare in Warangal
content: In Warangal, lakes that once tamed the rains are now being choked by concrete and encroachments. As floodwaters swallowed streets and colonies again this August, the city‚Äôs rapid urbanisation and neglect of its ancient water systems stood exposed

title: Accidents with elderly at the wheel reignite push for age-based restrictions
content: Two recent mishaps involved motorists in their 80s; experts call for regular medical tests, skill assessments and awareness campaigns to help improve road safety for older drivers

title: The day a village in Uttarkashi disappeared
content: On August 5, a deluge of rain that led to a landslide and flooding flattened the village of Dharali in Uttarakhand. So far, only one body has been retrieved and 69 people remain missing. Rescue teams are battling challenging conditions to do their work. Many, in this village of less than 1,000 people, have lost lives and livelihoods in the tragedy, reports Ishita Mishra

title: Leopard injures 12-year-old boy at Bengaluru‚Äôs Bannerghatta Biological Park
content: Environment Minister Eshwar Khandre expresses shock over the incident, instructs officials to install mesh on the windows of all safari vehicles at BBP

title: Reel shoots on railway tracks under scanner
content: ‚ÄòComplaints from residents, rail passengers, and traders are on the rise over the unsafe and reckless behaviour by youngsters near tracks for photography and videography‚Äô

title: Women are key drivers of India‚Äôs growth, says PM Modi
content: Mr. Modi also praised the transformative role of women‚Äôs self-help groups (SHGs), saying that programmes like the ‚ÄòNaMo Drone Didi‚Äô have given rural women a new identity

title: Hours before Putin-Trump talks, Zelenskyy hopes for Indian help in ending Russia-Ukraine war
content: In Independence Day message to India, Ukraine President says India and Ukraine have stood up for ‚Äòfreedom and dignity‚Äô

title: Landslide In Mumbai Kills 2, Extreme Heavy Rainfall Likely Today
content: Mumbai has been witnessing heavy rainfall today, causing waterlogging in many parts of the city, including Gandhi Nagar and Kings Circle.

title: Centre Warns Of "Constitutional Chaos" After Timeline Order For Governors
content: The government has warned against imposing a timeline on the President and Governors for clearing bills, differing with an earlier Supreme Court order.

title: Pregnant Bangladeshi Prisoner Escapes From Mumbai's JJ Hospital
content: A pregnant Bangladeshi prisoner has escaped from Mumbai's JJ Hospital, bringing into intense scrutiny the security protocols in place for prisoners. Mumbai Police has begun a city-wide search operation after her escape on Thursday afternoon.

title: Boy Falls Into Drain While Chasing Kite In Delhi
content: A seven-year-old boy fell into an open drain while trying to catch a kite in Northeast Delhi's Welcome area on Friday evening, prompting a search and rescue operation that was later suspended due to darkness, police said.

title: "Up To Zelensky Now": Trump After "10/10" Meet With Putin On Ukraine War
content: Donald Trump said Friday the onus was now on Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky to build on the Alaska summit between the US leader and Russia's President Vladimir Putin and secure a deal to end Russia's three-year invasion.

title: Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla Joins Independence Day Celebrations In US
content: India's 79th Independence Day was celebrated with patriotic fervor at the Consulate General of India in Houston on Friday, with a large turnout from the Indian diaspora in the early hours, despite it being a workday.

title: Video: B-2 Bomber Screeches Over Putin's Head In Trump's Show Of Might
content: The United States' military might was on full display on Friday at Alaska when a B-2 Spirit Stealth Bomber flanked by US fighter jets thundered across the sky above Russian President Vladimir Putin, as he met President Donald Trump.

title: "Tariffing India Won't Stop Putin": US Democrats Panel Amid Trump's Tariff Row
content: The Democratic panel's remarks came in response to US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's warning New Delhi of increasing secondary tariffs over the Russian oil trade.

title: Opinion: Opinion | On Janmashtami, A Few 'Krishna' Lessons For Indian Politics - And Politicians
content: Politicians should be humble and grounded. Arrogance, abuse of power, and a lack of respect for the rule of law inevitably lead to a leader's downfall, both politically and morally.

title: "Very Tragic": AAP Slams Delhi Government Over Roof Collapse, Waterlogging
content: Delhi Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) President Saurabh Bhardwaj on Friday urged the government to take immediate on-ground action after a roof collapse at the Dargah Sharif Patte Shah premises claimed six lives and left several others injured.

title: After "Productive Talks", Putin Offers To Host Trump "Next Time In Moscow"
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin offered Friday to host US counterpart Donald Trump in Moscow, extending the apparent invitation during a press conference.

title: From Russia-US Ties To Ukraine: What Putin Said During Joint Briefing With Trump
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin addressed the joint briefing after meeting US President Donald Trump in Alaska on Friday.

title: AAP To Back 'Deserving' Candidates Lacking Funds For Delhi University Student Union Polls
content: The Aam Aadmi Party's (AAP) youth wing on Friday announced to support Delhi University students wishing to contest union elections but unable to afford the costs.

title: "Rs 1 Lakh Crore Rhetoric": Rahul Gandhi Takes Jibe At PM Over Job Scheme
content: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi on Friday took a jibe at PM Modi over announcement of Rs 1 Lakh Crore PM Viksit Bharat Rozgar Yojana, saying that he is resorting to "same old rhetoric, same rehearsed figures" and that the "youth will get not jobs.

title: Trump, Putin End High-Stakes Alaska Meet After 3 Hours Of Talks: 10 Points
content: US President Donald Trump and his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin on Friday held a "very productive" and "mutually respectful" high-stakes summit in Alaska on the Ukraine crisis.

title: "No Deal Until A Deal": Trump, Putin End "Productive" Talks With No Results
content: US President Donald Trump on Friday said he had a "very productive" meeting with his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin on ending the Ukraine war, saying "we didn't get there but have a very good chance of getting there".

title: Ukraine War Would Not Have Happened If Trump Was At Helm In 2022: Putin
content: At the joint press conference that was held after the Alaska meet with US President Donald Trump, his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin said that the conflict in Ukraine would not have started if Trump would have been the President in 2022.

title: ''Why Should Trump Trust You?'': How Reporters Grilled Putin Ahead Of Alaska Meet
content: US President Donald Trump and his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin met for about 2.5 hours on Saturday at a high-stakes summit in Alaska that could shape the future of the Ukraine war.

title: Trump And Putin Share Handshake In Alaska, Ahead Of Talks
content: President Donald Trump greeted Russia's Vladimir Putin on Friday with a handshake, a smile and a ride in the presidential limousine before talks aimed at ending the conflict in Ukraine.

title: US Mulled Use Of Russia Icebreakers For Gas Development Ahead Of Summit, Say Sources
content: The US has had internal discussions on using Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker vessels to support the development of gas and LNG projects in Alaska as one of the possible deals to aim for when Trump meets Putin on Friday.

title: Government proposal in 2024 for a panel on ‚Äòdemographic challenges‚Äô never took off
content: In her Interim Budget speech on February 1, 2024, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said that the committee will be formed to consider the challenges arising from ‚Äúfast population growth and demographic changes‚Äù

title: Researcher arrested for plotting attack on Bengal Minister‚Äôs Car remanded to police custody
content: On Friday, when the researcher was produced before Alipore Court, the government pleader said that even though Hindol Majumdar was away in Spain, he was the prime conspirator in the attack on the Minister‚Äôs car in March 2025

title: ‚ÄòWe thought it was a bomb blast, and were shaking like a leaf‚Äô
content: While the count of injured stands at nine, the blast could have been far more devastating, as it occurred in a cluster of 17 houses ‚Äî each no larger than 10 feet by 10 feet, occupied by 60 residents

title: ‚ÄòMy idea is always to rely less on human witnesses and more on scientific evidence‚Äô
content: The head of the SIT investigating the Prajwal Revanna case shares insights into the high-profile cases he dealt with, including the murders of Gauri Lankesh and M.M. Kalburgi

title: British retailer Tesco to set up distribution centre; to create 15,000 additional jobs in Karnataka
content: Rolls-Royce, another UK-based company, is also actively exploring fresh investments to further its presence in the State

title: Will go to Delhi and speak to high command to know the reason for sacking: Rajanna
content: ‚ÄòI might have spoken certain truth. I will go to Delhi and try to find out [about the easons for my sacking]‚Äô

title: Sanjay Raut calls PM Modi ‚ÄòCongressvadi‚Äô, slams for using Swadeshi in speech
content: Shiv Sena MP Sanjay Raut criticises PM Modi‚Äôs Independence Day speech, accusing him of becoming ‚ÄúCongressvadi‚Äù and creating communal divide

title: Six killed as vehicle jumps divider and hits truck in Chhattisgarh
content: The victims were travelling from Indore to Puri via Chhattisgarh when the vehicle they were in hit a road divider and vaulted over it to collide with a truck coming from the opposite direction

title: Supreme Court Collegium cannot dictate names to High Court Collegiums: CJI Gavai
content: Chief Justice says in a federal judiciary, the Supreme Court and the State High Courts are neither superior nor inferior to each other, and the relationship is that of mutual respect

title: Watch: Why is an Assamese group not celebrating Independence Day?
content: The United Liberation Front of Asom (ULFA) has once again made headlines after its Independent faction (ULFA-I) announced a boycott of India‚Äôs Independence Day

title: Stree Shakti will foster women‚Äôs financial independence, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: Launching free bus travel scheme for women, CM calls it a brother‚Äôs gift to his sisters across the State on  Independence Day; says the facility is being provided in 8,458 (74%) buses of APSRTC

title: J.C. Road braces for gridlock as BBMP set to begin milling works
content: The 1.3-km route from Minerva Circle to Town Hall Junction, normally covered in six to ten minutes depending on congestion on connecting roads, now takes at least 15 minutes for two-wheelers and 20 minutes for other vehicles

title: Palaniswami raises doubts over ‚ÄòThayumanavar‚Äô programme
content: Which vehicles do you intend to move the ration goods with? There are reports that private vehicles are used. How will pay for these vehicles, asks the AIADMK general secretary

title: Stray dog menace spirals in Thrissur as attacks rise and control efforts stall
content: Over 29,000 dog bite cases reported in 2024; public opposition derails new Animal Birth Control centres

title: 10-year-old boy dead, 9 injured in blast caused by gas leak in Bengaluru
content: The deceased Mubarak‚Äôs eight-year-old sister, Fathima, is serious and is being treated in a  hospital.

title: For Chengara land struggle families of Pullur-Periye, freedom still feels far away
content: 85 families, including Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes, and other communities, shifted to the hilly terrain 15 years ago after participating in the Chengara land struggle.  Beneficiaries say there have been deceived, allotted barren laterite plots, making farming and dignified living impossible

title: Special drive to sensitise passengers to need to travel with valid tickets
content: Drive will focus on originating stations of the most crowded trains, where ticket checking teams will ensure that only passengers with valid tickets are allowed to board

title: Major GST shake-up: 12% and 28% slabs to be axed
content: Only 5% and 18% slabs to be retained; 99% of items currently in the 12% slab will be moved to the 5% rate and 90% of goods and services in the 28% bracket will move to 18%; there will be no cess of any kind over and above the GST rates

title: Andhra Pradesh targets 15% growth, poverty-free State under ‚ÄòSwarna Andhra 2047‚Äô: Minister
content: At I-Day celebrations, Nadendla Manohar outlines P4 programme‚Äôs anti-poverty push, welfare schemes, major investments, and infrastructure projects

title: ADGP Ajith Kumar blames political vendetta, police discord and anti-national interests for graft case against him
content: After a special court here rebuffed the VACB preliminary enquiry report exonerating the high-ranking officer from any wrongdoing, the police officer claims charges against him were politically motivated, fuelled by anti-national elements.

title: Defend Assamese identity, says Assam CM in I-Day speech

title: TDP, JSP leaders recall freedom fighters‚Äô vision, stress need to uphold democratic values
content: On 79th Independence Day, leaders call for governance rooted in equality, self-respect and constitutional ideals

title: Before Sepoy Mutiny, the palegars of Chitradurga attempted a rebellion against the British
content: The chieftains, confined in Bengaluru, made an escape and tried to organise a rebellion in 1849 around Dodderi

title: Fulfil freedom fighters‚Äô dreams, Minister urges people

title: Opposition hits out at Oil Ministry‚Äôs poster featuring Savarkar and Gandhi

title: Why Liverpool signed Giovanni Leoni, and how he fits with the Reds
content: a ¬£26 million signing of centre back Giovanni Leoni from Serie A side Parma has bolstered their defensive line . the 18-year-old is still just dipping his toes in the pool of top-level senior football . but the reds have seen enough from 14 league starts to sanction a quick move .

title: Augusta National ditches the masses in a quest for higher revenues
content: the 2026 "Official Masters Hospitality" program includes offers of housing, transportation, catering and so on to the corporate and/or well-heeled . the "Full Scale, Private Home Program," which will run you a mere $219,600 for the week, comes days after the announcement that a local Hooters restaurant is closing .

title: Will the NBA offseason frenzy return? 10 storylines we're watching for 2026

title: Little League, big dreams: Mets, Mariners players as Little Leaguers
content: the 2025 Little League World Series is underway . some of the best young players around the country will make it . this year's baseball Little League Classic between the Seattle Mariners and New York Mets will feature a number of baseball players .

title: From 'KGB' to Central Michigan: What we learned, and didn't learn, from the Michigan report
content: Connor Stalions referred to his advanced sign-stealing operation as both "counterintelligence" and "the KGB" the former Michigan staffer called the video it elicited "dirty film" and ultimately threw his phone in a pond . the punishments for that operation arrived on Friday .
